panels.description: Total pipeline executions completed in last N hours.

targets.expr: sum by(environment) (increase(pipeline_execution_end_count_total{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env"}[$__range])) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Completed Executions

panels.description: Total pipeline executions successfully completed in last N hours.

targets.expr: ceil(sum by(environment) (increase(pipeline_execution_end_count_total{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", status=~"SUCCEEDED|IGNORE_FAILED"}[$__range]))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Succeeded Executions

panels.description: Total pipeline executions failed in last N hours.

targets.expr: ceil(sum by(environment) (increase(pipeline_execution_end_count_total{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", status=~"FAILED|EXPIRED"}[$__range]))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Failed / Expired Executions

panels.description: Total pipeline executions currently running at this moment in time.

targets.expr: sum(avg by(accountId) (last_over_time(pipeline_executions_gauge{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env"}[1m]))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Current Executions

panels.description: Total pipeline executions successfully completed in last 10 minutes.

targets.expr: ceil(sum by(environment) (delta(pipeline_execution_end_count_total{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", status=~"SUCCEEDED|IGNORE_FAILED", edition="ENTERPRISE"}[10m]))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Succeeded Executions

panels.description: Total pipeline executions failed in last 10 minutes.

targets.expr: ceil(sum by(environment) (delta(pipeline_execution_end_count_total{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", status=~"FAILED|EXPIRED", edition="ENTERPRISE"}[10m]))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Failed / Expired Executions

targets.expr: topk(5, sum by(accountId) (delta(pipeline_execution_end_count_total{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", status=~"FAILED|EXPIRED", edition="ENTERPRISE"}[1h])))

panels.title: Top Failed / Expired Executions by Account ID [Paid] [1 hour rolling window]

panels.description: Error rate is the percentage of transactions that result in HTTP 5xx response.

targets.expr: absent_over_time(custom_googleapis_com:opencensus_pipeline_execution_end_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container"}[1m])

panels.description: Latency P95 means that 95 percent of the requests have a response time of less than the P95 value.

targets.expr: absent_over_time(custom_googleapis_com:opencensus_pipeline_execution_end_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container"}[1m])
